name: Intern Thank You Game
description:
Internship By Ocular, Belgium

To say thank you to everyone in Ocular for having me in their team as an intern, I decided to make a small mario based 2D platformer.  

There are 3 levels where you can collect coins, defeat some enemies and find  three big coins in each level

Instal

Download the correct zip file (Windows or Mac), unzip it an run the .exe or .app file.

Note: this is not a virus, you can trust me.

How to play

Movement => left & right buttons or A &D 

Jump => space

Pause => P
